DescKGC.tools.config_manager package#

class DescKGC.tools.config_manager.ConfigManager(local_config_path='.kgc_config.yaml', default_config=DescKGCConfig(topic='network science', neo4jdb=Neo4jDBSettings(url='bolt://localhost:7687', username='neo4j', password='123.x.abc'), chromadb=ChromaDBSettings(chroma_db_impl='duckdb+parquet', persist_directory='./data/chroma/', collection_name='default_collection', distance_function='l2'), extractor={'arxiv': ArxivExtractorSettings(data_path='./data/arxiv/', vs_key_info={'embedding_key': 'summary', 'metadata_keys': ['title']}), 'entity': EntityExtractorSettings(vs_key_info={'embedding_key': 'description', 'metadata_keys': ['name', 'general', 'type']})}, llm=LLMSettings(model_name='gpt-3.5-turbo', temperature=0.3), shortenings=ShorteningsSettings(Paper='p', Concept='c', Model='m', Dataset='d'), entity_alignment=EntityAlignmentSettings(entity_types=['Concept', 'Model', 'Dataset'], threshold=0.08)), verbose=False)[source]#

class DescKGC.tools.config_manager.base.ConfigManager(local_config_path='.kgc_config.yaml', default_config=DescKGCConfig(topic='network science', neo4jdb=Neo4jDBSettings(url='bolt://localhost:7687', username='neo4j', password='123.x.abc'), chromadb=ChromaDBSettings(chroma_db_impl='duckdb+parquet', persist_directory='./data/chroma/', collection_name='default_collection', distance_function='l2'), extractor={'arxiv': ArxivExtractorSettings(data_path='./data/arxiv/', vs_key_info={'embedding_key': 'summary', 'metadata_keys': ['title']}), 'entity': EntityExtractorSettings(vs_key_info={'embedding_key': 'description', 'metadata_keys': ['name', 'general', 'type']})}, llm=LLMSettings(model_name='gpt-3.5-turbo', temperature=0.3), shortenings=ShorteningsSettings(Paper='p', Concept='c', Model='m', Dataset='d'), entity_alignment=EntityAlignmentSettings(entity_types=['Concept', 'Model', 'Dataset'], threshold=0.08)), verbose=False)[source]#

class DescKGC.tools.config_manager.default_config.DescKGCConfig(*, topic: str = 'network science', neo4jdb: Neo4jDBSettings = Neo4jDBSettings(url='bolt://localhost:7687', username='neo4j', password='123.x.abc'), chromadb: ChromaDBSettings = ChromaDBSettings(chroma_db_impl='duckdb+parquet', persist_directory='./data/chroma/', collection_name='default_collection', distance_function='l2'), extractor: dict = {'arxiv': ArxivExtractorSettings(data_path='./data/arxiv/', vs_key_info={'embedding_key': 'summary', 'metadata_keys': ['title']}), 'entity': EntityExtractorSettings(vs_key_info={'embedding_key': 'description', 'metadata_keys': ['name', 'general', 'type']})}, llm: LLMSettings = LLMSettings(model_name='gpt-3.5-turbo', temperature=0.3), shortenings: ShorteningsSettings = ShorteningsSettings(Paper='p', Concept='c', Model='m', Dataset='d'), entity_alignment: EntityAlignmentSettings = EntityAlignmentSettings(entity_types=['Concept', 'Model', 'Dataset'], threshold=0.08))[source]#
